text: Hey, Tom. I saw you taking lots of pics with your cell phone outside the building. Are you into photography? Yes, I love it, but I'm only practicing. How about you? Do you have any hobbies? That's cool. I like photography, but I don't think of it as a hobby. I play the guitar in my free time Wow electric or acoustic Electric for sure back to your hobbies though. Do you have any favorite photography themes? I like landscapes and street photography mostly and you what kind of music do you like to play on your guitar? I enjoy classic rock, but any nice tune makes my day Cool. I want to hear you play someday Only if you show me your favorite picks. It's a deal

dialogue.text: Hey, Tom. I saw you taking lots of pics with your cell phone outside the building. Are you into photography?
Yes, I love it, but I'm only practicing. How about you? Do you have any hobbies?
That's cool. I like photography, but I don't think of it as a hobby. I play the guitar in my free time
Electric for sure back to your hobbies though. Do you have any favorite photography themes?
I like landscapes and street photography mostly and you what kind of music do you like to play on your guitar?
I enjoy classic rock, but any nice tune makes my day
Cool. I want to hear you play someday
Only if you show me your favorite picks. It's a deal
